#include <iostream>
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main() 
{
	long long int t,ar[1000000],m;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
	    int count=0;
	    long long int current;
	    cin>>m;
	    for(int i=0;i<m;i++)
	    {
	        cin>>ar[i];
	    }
	    current=ar[0];
	    for(int i=1;i<m;i++)
	    {
	        if(ar[i]>current)
	        {
	            count++;
	            current=ar[i];
	        }
	    }
	    cout<<count<<" ";
	}
	return 0;
}
